n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
arr=c(5,8,9,3,4,6,1,7)
n=length(arr)
arr=sort(arr)
b=array(0)
if(n%%2!=0){
  b[n]=arr[n]
  for(i in 1:((n-1)/2)){
    b[2*i-1]=arr[2*i]
    b[2*i]=arr[2*i-1]
  }
print(1)
}else if(n%%2==0){
  for(i in 1:(n/2)){
    b[2*i-1]=arr[2*i]
    b[2*i]=arr[2*i-1]
  }
print(1)
}else{
  print(0)
